Posts.Content: I had a mestatic prostate cancer and my form kills 99.9% of men who get it, within 6-8 months. I commenced researching cancer and then learned of the Johanna Budwig regimen to beat cancers. So I quickly adopted it and now here I am 18 months later and no sign of cancer in me, anywhere. My doctors are amazed!!Â  So if you have cancer or knows of someone who does. tell them to google the name "Johanna Budwig" and then follow the diet regimen. The regimen is fairly simple
Posts.Title: Metastatic or not?
